entry.title: Diwali & Govardhan Puja
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

Shri Govindji Gaudiya Matha invites all the Houston Vasis to celebrate Diwali and Govardhan puja.

Oct. 31. Thursday
Diwali Eve. Candle light Arati - 7pm

Nov. 2 Saturday.
Govardhan puja - Anna-kuta Mahotsav.
5pm to 7:30pm.
HariNaam sankirtan, Maha Arati followed by big feast - Maha Prasad.

Special Note: This is the day in the whole year that everyone is welcome to cook and bring as many dishes as you want in a bowl size quantity.
Absolutely no onion no garlic.
Cooking pot should be clean preferably new pot.

Or you can bring
DRY items like snacks, dry fruits and dry sweets.

Please bring your dishes max by 6:30pm.

Please come with your family, friends and relatives for
Anna-kuta darshan , Thakur ji s darshan and divine blessings.
To serve in this very auspicious celebrations,
Please post this message to all your groups, Facebook page, websites etc.

entry.title: Sri Radha Astami
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

SRI GOVINDJI GAUDIYA MATH IS CELEBRATING the most glorious and auspicious festival of the year: Sri Radha Ashtami on September 11 Wed.
6pm - 8:30pm.

On this day we celebrate the appearance day of Sri Radha Rani, the eternal shakti of supreme Lord Sri Krishna. We will have ecstatic Kirtan, Janam lila katha, and Maha Arati. Maha-Prasadam will be served.

This is a very devotional and spiritual day as we celebrate the divine potency of Lord Krishna, Sri Radha Rani. Come and celebrate with your family and take the blessings of this auspicious day.

TO sponsor the festival OR TO GET MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL 832-464-4686 AND CHECK OUR WEBSITE SGGM.ORG

Adress: 16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd Houston tx 77084

SPECIAL NOTE : anyone is welcome to bring a basket (CHAAV) of shringar items like bangles, bindi , perfume, sindoor and chunris. Fruits, dry fruits, dry sweets etc. To offer to Srimati Radhika Rani. All the prasad will be distributed after offering.

Thanks Haribol

Please invite everyone and spread this message as much as possible and post everywhere.

Haribol.
